QUEST.helpText: Continue your training in the classroom.

DIALOGUE.SPEECH: Great! Looks like we're all here.
Now, while you cadets were taking a break, I've been talking to the Crystal Order's engineers who built the Death Cube.
It seems that the service bots on the Death Cube are going to present a bit of a headache.
But aren't service bots harmless? They just maintain and repair the ship.
Normally, that would be the case.
However, in cases of high alert, like during space combat, the service bots will patrol the ship, and alert the security drones to any intrusions.
Which complicates matters, since there are so many of them it's almost impossible to avoid them altogether.
So, once on the Death Cube, you'll need to work together and systematically eliminate the service bots and security drones, before you make your way to the generator room.
Which you will practice now using the simulator. So, let's get cracking!
Yeah, I'm so hungry now but we did it!
Not bad! Looks like we've got a real shot at defeating the rogue Grandmaster.
Now, you should all go back and get some well earned rest.

SEQUENCE.NARRATION: You couldn't agree more with Scottie.
You follow your equally tired classmates as they all shuffle out of the classroom, eager to get back to their rooms to rest up before the looming battle.
